topic: Case studies on using shuffled prompts in creative writing and brainstorming
content: Generated from lens processing: My working hypothesis is that shuffling prompts and intentionally synthesizing them can lead to meaningful insights and innovations. The next step is to create a system or tool for shuffling prompts, perhaps using software or a physical card deck, and test it in creative writing workshops or brainstorming sessions. This will help evaluate its effectiveness in fostering creativity and critical thinking.

metadata.trigger: If I shuffled my own prompts, what new ones emerge?
